nodes.text: Anolo was a Muun and a Vice Chairman of the InterGalactic Banking Clan on Mygeeto during the Imperial Era.

On Mygeeto, Jabba the Hutt sent troops to capture a Givin codebreaker whose brain was able to decode Imperial security codes. Anolo attempted to flee with the codebreaker, but was caught by Greedo and Takvaa, two of Jabba's enforcers. In the ensuing fight, Anolo was shot in the chest and killed by Greedo.
Anolo first appeared in Galaxy's Edge 2, a comic written by Ethan Sacks and illustrated by Will Sliney. The comic was published on April 24, 2019.
